messages.text: 오늘도 디버깅과 함께하는 월요일
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: Another day, another merge conflict
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: pssst I see dead people
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: 다른 로컬에서 메시지 기여 테스트
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: It works on my machine
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: console.log로 디버깅하는 나... 언제 성장할까
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: Programmer: A machine that turns coffee into code
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: Stack Overflow가 없다면 내 코드의 90%는 존재하지 않을 것
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: When I wrote this code, only God and I understood what I did. Now only God knows
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: 월요일에 작성한 코드를 한 주 내내 디버깅하느니 차라리 월요일에 침대에 누워있는 게 나을 때가 있다
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: There are only 10 types of people in this world: those who understand binary and those who don't
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: 카페인을 코드로 변환하는 유기체입니다
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: Programming is like sex: One mistake and you have to support it for the rest of your life
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: 99 little bugs in the code, 99 little bugs. Take one down, patch it around, 127 little bugs in the code
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: 하드웨어와 소프트웨어의 차이? 하드웨어는 발로 찰 수 있다는 것
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it's bad
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: 인터넷에서 복사한 코드를 프로덕션에 붙여넣는 것은 길거리에서 주운 껌을 씹는 것과 같다
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: A SQL query walks into a bar. He approaches two tables and says, 'Mind if I join you?'
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: 프로그래밍의 절반은 코딩이다. 나머지 90%는 디버깅이다
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: Sometimes it pays to stay in bed on Monday, rather than spending the rest of the week debugging Monday's code
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: 변수명을 지을 때가 가장 창의적인 순간
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: How many programmers does it take to change a light bulb? None, that's a hardware problem
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: 주석이 거짓말할 때가 있지만 코드는 절대 거짓말하지 않는다
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: Talk is cheap. Show me the code
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: Don't worry if it doesn't work right. If everything did, you'd be out of a job
messages.author: yybmion

messages.text: It's not a bug; it's an undocumented feature
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: Computers are fast; developers keep them slow
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: If, at first, you do not succeed, call it version 1.0
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: Walking on water and developing software from a specification are easy if both are frozen
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: Software and cathedrals are much the same — first we build them, then we pray
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: The best thing about a boolean is even if you are wrong, you are only off by a bit
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: Any code of your own that you haven't looked at for six or more months might as well have been written by someone else
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: That's what's cool about working with computers. They don't argue, they remember everything, and they don't drink all your beer
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: The 50-50-90 rule: Anytime you have a 50-50 chance of getting something right, there's a 90% probability you'll get it wrong
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: Only half of programming is coding. The other 90% is debugging
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: Profanity is the one language all programmers know best
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: There is nothing quite so permanent as a quick fix
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: There's no test like production
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: Life would be so much easier if we only had the source code
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: Mac users swear by their Mac, PC users swear at their PC
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: Press any key to continue or any other key to quit
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: The collective noun for a group of programmers is a merge-conflict
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: Java is to JavaScript what Car is to Carpet
messages.author: anonymous

messages.text: Never trust a computer you can't throw out a window
messages.author: anonymous
